feed.title: Transitory Soft Forks for Consensus Cleanup Forks

entry.title: Transitory Soft Forks for Consensus Cleanup Forks
entry.summary: To clarify, the task you've asked for seems to require summarizing a provided email content following specific rules. However, it appears there was no actual email content given in your request that I could summarize for you. Could you please provide the text or details from the email you'd like summarized into a blog post format?
